item.title: Notion Sites takes Notion sites up a level
item.description:
Popular productivity tool, Notion, has long allowed its users to make any of their pages public. Now, the company is expanding on this with the launch of Notion Sites, which adds several new features to its existing publishing tools. For the most part, these are pretty straightforward, but together, they do make for a more […]

item.title: Maximize your deal flow at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description:
Investors, you know you need to keep your pipelines primed, and one of the best places to find early-stage startups with promising portfolio potential is, you guessed it, TechCrunch Disrupt. TechCrunch is here to help. Let’s take a look at all the ways you can pump up your pipeline at Disrupt and keep the deals […]

item.title: Payabli is building payment management tools for software startups
item.description:
Payabli builds the infrastructure that allows companies, specifically software companies, to embed and facilitate payments through APIs.

item.title: Patreon introduces a gifting feature and other creator tools
item.description:
Patreon, the paid membership platform for creators, announced Tuesday the release of new features designed to help creators monetize their non-paying followers and tap into new revenue streams. This includes the ability to sell individual posts, a gifting feature for fans to gift limited-time subscriptions, and promotional tools for sharing clips on social media.   The […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Google brings its Gemini AI to Gmail to help you write and summarize emails
item.description:
Google is rolling out a new Gemini AI side panel in Gmail that can help you write emails and summarize email threads. The company is also adding the Gemini side panel to Docs, Sheets, Slides, and Drive. The launch of the new features comes shortly after Google announced them last month at its I/O developer […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Apple launches iPhone Mirroring on Mac in latest iOS and Mac betas
item.description:
iPhone mirroring, one of the more notable features arriving in Apple’s upcoming operating systems, is now available to developers testing the beta versions of iOS 18 and macOS Sequoia. The latest beta releases include support for mirroring your iPhone directly on the Mac, so you can use your phone on your computer, including launching and […]

item.title: Microsoft broke antitrust rules by bundling Teams, EU says
item.description: It’s the second major action in as many days by the European Commission against a Big Tech company.
